Type Method# setTurn(forSeats:context:)

visionOS 2.0+

```
static func setTurn(
    forSeats seats: some Sequence,
    context: UInt64 = 0
) -> Self
```

Available when `Self` is `SetTurnAction`.## [See Also](/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopAction/setTurn(forSeats:context:)-3msxi#see-also)
